name: icon-fronted-v2
description: User facing front-end web application for ICON (Immunization Connect ONtario)

scripts.install-exact: echo "Installing ICON front-end application dependencies (exact versions) ..." && npm install -E
scripts.build-cleanup: echo "Attempting to remove previous dist folder if it existed ..." && rimraf -f dist
scripts.build-prod: echo "Building optimized production version of ICON front-end application ..." && webpack --config webpack.prod.config.js
scripts.build-dev-serve-hot-reload: echo "Building dev version of ICON front-end application (hot-reloaded) at http://localhost:3001 ..." && npm install -E && webpack-dev-server --config webpack.dev.config.js --silent --hot --inline --port 3001 --content-base ./src/
scripts.static-serve: echo "Serving ICON front-end application statically at http://localhost:3001 ..." && http-server -a localhost -p 3001 -c-1 ./dist -s
scripts.generate-docs: echo "Generating documentation for ICON front-end application (check directory /out) ..." && jsdoc -c ./jsdoc.config.js -r
scripts.lab: echo WARNING! This command is deprecated, instead use: "> npm run dev" && npm run dev
scripts.start: npm run build-cleanup && npm run build-prod
scripts.test: npm run test-unit && npm run test-e2e
